text:
you can always create a form on HubSpot, then use the form submission api to send the data over:

<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form>

then run the _hsq function in the callback

Why not take advantage of the language variations for global content?

Create a header then just go into the global editor and create language variations for each language that you're using.
